cause.description:
We are currently on a race against time to save Bernard the mole from the pest controls trap. He is being hunted down at number 12 Mill Drive , his life hangs in the balance! He doesn't deserve to die the mole has a right to life also !!!!!!!!!
1. the mole has a right to life !
cause.mission: Save this fluffy furry little mole from the cruel traps being set up for him !!!
cause.name: SAVE BERNARD THE MOLE AT NUMBER 12 MILL DRIVE
